text: The Indiana Credit Union League honored Joe as its 2018 Outstanding Hoosier Legislator. The award recognizes Joe’s bipartisan work to craft regulatory relief legislation – which was signed into law – that is helping reduce burdens on the 154 community credit unions in Indiana. https://t.co/yUo7lmZJCp

Pres. Trump has signed into law bipartisan legislation Joe supported and helped pass that will ensure that pharmacists are not prevented from telling consumers the cheapest options for their prescriptions. https://t.co/WAVhp6btaz

Happy #NationalFarmersDay to all the hardworking Hoosier farmers who help feed communities across Indiana, our country, and the world. It’s an honor to be your hired help.  –Joe https://t.co/cNYrk93RcC

Joe secured a number of bipartisan provisions that would benefit Hoosiers in the ‘America’s Water Infrastructure Act’, which passed the Senate earlier this week. One provision would help remedy erosion issues on the Ohio River near Clarksville. Read more: https://t.co/9ybQWa6yCR https://t.co/8x8WozFFiD

Joe is a strong supporter of Israel and its security, as it is our greatest ally in the Middle East. He was proud to work with @SenTedCruz to get bipartisan anti-human shields legislation passed in the Senate. https://t.co/elJHIDtr2m https://t.co/svJPasfeGN

The disappearance of Jamal Khashoggi - an ISU grad - is deeply disturbing. Joe sent a letter to President Trump asking him to make a Global Magnitsky Act sanctions determination. https://t.co/XnRjwgUV5M https://t.co/kEfgDcqqnA
Happy 243rd birthday to the @USNavy. Thank you to the brave men and women of the Navy – including at Crane in Indiana - for your service and sacrifice. – Joe https://t.co/F4P8Ap1KrN

(1/2)#GoodNews: @GaryChiAirport new customs facility welcomed its first international flight this week from Copenhagen, Denmark. The new facility allows airport users to fly into Gary from around the world without having to stop elsewhere to clear customs. https://t.co/5rF9hl2827

(2/2) Joe, who worked for years to help expand the airport’s runway, was part of the opening ceremony for the new facility, which allows for more passengers, and further boosts the region’s economy. https://t.co/AZjmFc6CXn

Hoosier farmers are dealing w/ low commodity prices, chaotic trade markets, & uncertain federal policy, which is why Joe included a number of provisions in the Senate-passed Farm Bill that will help our farmers navigate significant challenges & provide them with some stability. https://t.co/Y0nj6TUre3

The current Farm Bill expired last month and Joe has consistently called for quick action to find agreement on a final version of the 2018 Farm Bill that ensures certainty for our farmers.  https://t.co/5ZHQ78NULv

Joe called on @HHSGov @Secazar to begin updating the guidelines for the way the federal government coordinates investigations into potential cancer clusters. He emphasized the importance of working with the families and communities experiencing the concerns. https://t.co/UcHyTnHKy8
Today, Joe was honored to receive the ‘Friend of Farm Bureau’ award from the @INFarmBureau for his efforts to advocate for Hoosier farmers and rural communities. https://t.co/kSwOarQV4e

The Senate unanimously passed Joe and @SenTedCruz ’s bipartisan “STOP Using Human Shields Act”, which would impose sanctions on those who use civilians as human shields, including terror groups such as Hamas and Hezbollah, as well as their enablers.  https://t.co/elJHIDtr2m https://t.co/XrrU0iJqOu

(1/3) Joe opposes efforts to cut Medicare and Social Security, which Hoosier seniors have paid into and are counting on in retirement.

(2/3) Today, Senate Majority Leader McConnell said he wants to “adjust” Medicare and Social Security to deal with growing deficits. The non-partisan CBO has said the deficit is rising “primarily” due to the partisan McConnell-Ryan tax law from 2017. https://t.co/3hU6gQhEN0

(3/3) In the fiscal year that ended September 30th, the federal deficit jumped to $779 billion. CBO now forecasts the annual deficit to exceed $1 trillion by 2020, two years earlier than previously expected, in part due to the partisan tax law. https://t.co/R24IjkFlGW
